snippet: Gov. Pat McCrory vetoed a measure on Thursday that would have imposed a drug-testing mandate on some welfare applicants.
abstract: North Carolina Gov Pat McCrory vetoes measure that would have imposed a drug-testing mandate on some welfare applicants.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Pat McCrory vetoed a measure on Thursday that would have imposed a drug-testing mandate on some welfare applicants.

headline.main: North Carolina: Drug Testing for Welfare Aid Vetoed
headline.print_headline: North Carolina: Drug Testing For Welfare Aid Vetoed
